url.description: In deployment context the final url that the site will sit (exclude subDir as it auto gets added). In content context its only used for endpoints

location.description: When ftp/scp content this is where the files are pulled from, in ftp/sftp this is where files are placed

ssh.description: The correct secret.json file to grab when deploying, should be stored in ~/targets

ftp.description: The ftp IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

ftps.description: The ftps IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

lftp.description: The lftp IP, .ftppass with all ftp creds should be stored in ~/targets

cookie.description: Set to override the cookie value, if not set then it will use the title of the instance

singleUserExpireTime.description: Used for single time user passwords to dictate how long the user is valid for. Provide as plain english e.g 2 minutes. default: 1 hour

logo.description: Set which logo to use on the login page (only works on style-1)

subDir.description: If sub directory needed then specify name here e.g. 'test'
